title: Gohar-e-Nayab
overview: About a girl Goher Nayab (Gori) who moves to her uncle's houseafter her mother dies and her father remarries. There is no place for Goher Nayab.She is unwelcomed at heruncle's house and lives a life of acute suffering among waging tongues and rude behavior of people. She dreams of having a house she can call her own. Fate intervenes and she is married into a well-off family. But after marriage she suffers the ill-treatmentof her mother in law and realizes she will be thrown out of that house too. Gori gets pregnant but she doesn't want her child to live a disturbed life like hers. Finally she is rewarded. She learns that it's not concrete houses but love that makes life beautiful.
